description.value:
You are opposed to violence.

  • Restrained Violence (3): Will not attack non-combatants, surrendered foes, or clearly innocent people. Make [[/save type=will]] (1 success required) to harm anyone who hasn't directly threatened you.
  • Absolute Non-Violence (5): Will never deal lethal damage. All your attacks must be non-lethal, and you cannot deliver killing blows even to defeated enemies.
